类 XmlRecordOutput

java.lang.Object

所有已实现的接口：
RecordOutput
已过时。 Replaced by Avro. 

@Deprecated
@InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class XmlRecordOutput
extends Object
implements RecordOutput

XML Serializer.
